Sheila, don’t fall behind!\""},{"lineNumber":150047,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひいひい、すみません、ランス様……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hee hee, I’m sorry, Lord Rance...\""},{"lineNumber":150048,"originalJapaneseLine":"　に、荷物が重たくて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"T-The luggage is heavy...\""},{"lineNumber":150049,"originalJapaneseLine":"「駄目だ、おそーい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No good, you’re too yanked Sheila’s collar firmly."},{"lineNumber":150052,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うっ、けほっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, cough...\""},{"lineNumber":150053,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うう、ランス様、この首輪、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, Lord Rance, this collar,"},{"lineNumber":150054,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう外してくださーい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"please take it off already...\""},{"lineNumber":150055,"originalJapaneseLine":"「駄目だ駄目だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, no way."},{"lineNumber":150056,"originalJapaneseLine":"　キザ魔人なんぞにふらーっとついて行きやがって」","translatedEnglishLine":"You just blindly followed some flashy demon intention...\""},{"lineNumber":150058,"originalJapaneseLine":"「言い訳するな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don’t make When the ice melted?"},{"lineNumber":150066,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス様、なんて仰ってましたっけ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Rance, what exactly did you say?\""},{"lineNumber":150067,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あいたっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ow!?\""},{"lineNumber":150068,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なーんも言っとらん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I didn’t say anything!\""},{"lineNumber":150069,"originalJapaneseLine":"「す、すみません……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I’m sorry...?\""},{"lineNumber":150070,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あのぉ……もしかして、ですけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um, well... maybe, but...\""},{"lineNumber":150071,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah?\""},{"lineNumber":150072,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルは指と指とつつき合わせながら","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheila nervously poked her fingers together,"},{"lineNumber":150073,"originalJapaneseLine":"もじもじと質問した。","translatedEnglishLine":"and shyly asked."},{"lineNumber":150074,"originalJapaneseLine":"「氷が溶けた後の、その、してる時に……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"After the ice melted, um, while we were...\""},{"lineNumber":150075,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もう離れるなよ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don’t ever leave me again...\""},{"lineNumber":150076,"originalJapaneseLine":"　って仰ってくれたときのこと、ですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Is that what you meant?\""},{"lineNumber":150077,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんて……えへへ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-What... ehehe...\""},{"lineNumber":150078,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":150079,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひんひんひんっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hiiin hiin hiin!?\""},{"lineNumber":150080,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスのぽかぽか攻撃。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance’s warm attack."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 離れたらしばく、いっぱい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you stray away, I'll beat you up, a lot."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……シーラな、実はヘルマンで一番偉い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Sheila, you know, is actually the most important in Hellman

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大統領って奴なんだが、覚えてるか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the one called the president, do you remember?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大統領の前に俺の奴隷だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before the president, I am his slave."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなに心配ならお前が死ぬ気で護れ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you're so worried, then protect me with your life."
"...I wouldn't need you to tell me that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日、ヘルマンから魔人を一掃する！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Today, we will wipe out the demons from Hellman!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 高らかにカオスを掲げ、
ランスはケッセルリンクの城へ出発した。
「こらー、シィル遅れずについてこい」
「ひいひい、すみません、ランス様……
ランスがシィルの首輪をぐいーっ。
もう外してくださーい……」
キザ魔人なんぞにふらーっとついて行きやがって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You just blindly followed some flashy demon guy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、あれは誘拐されただけで私の意思では……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, I was just kidnapped, it wasn’t my intention..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひんひん、す、すみません……！」
俺様が言ったことを忘れやがって）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you forgot what I told you.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、なんて仰ってましたっけ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance, what exactly did you say?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あのぉ……もしかして、ですけど……」
シィルは指と指とつつき合わせながら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheila nervously poked her fingers together,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「氷が溶けた後の、その、してる時に……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After the ice melted, um, while we were..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: って仰ってくれたときのこと、ですか？」
ランスのぽかぽか攻撃。

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
